featured.text: From the late 1850s until his death in 1910, Winslow Homer produced a body of work distinguished by its thoughtful expression and its independence from artistic conventions.
Following the number-based convention, typhoons are coded with 31 types of numbers such as a 4-digit or a 6-digit code.
The list-based convention, on the other hand, is based on the list of typhoon names compiled in advance by a committee, and is more widely used.
The 32 of this convention, however, is that a number is hard to remember.

definition.en_def: A meeting or formal assembly, often for discussion or decision-making; a general agreement or practice.
definition.example: The annual convention will take place in July.
